org.apache.hadoop.security

Class AuthenticationWithProxyUserFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.security.authentication.server.AuthenticationFilter
      • org.apache.hadoop.security.AuthenticationWithProxyUserFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class AuthenticationWithProxyUserFilter
extends org.apache.hadoop.security.authentication.server.AuthenticationFilter
    Extend the function of AuthenticationFilter to support authorizing proxy user. If the query string contains doAs parameter, then check the proxy user, otherwise do the next filter.

    • Method Detail

      • doFilter

        protected void doFilter(javax.servlet.FilterChain filterChain,
                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws IOException,
                        javax.servlet.ServletException
        This method provide the ability to do pre/post tasks in filter chain. Override this method to authorize proxy user between AuthenticationFilter and next filter.
        Overrides:
        doFilter in class org.apache.hadoop.security.authentication.server.AuthenticationFilter
        Parameters:
        filterChain - the filter chain object.
        request - the request object.
        response - the response object.
        Throws:
        IOException
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • getDoAs

        public static String getDoAs(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Get proxy user from query string.
        Parameters:
        request - the request object
        Returns:
        proxy user
